Header.title: CU Blockchain Society
Header.paragraph: Join us to build at the frontier of the blockchain revolution (Token coming soon!)

About.paragraph: We are a community that onboards future engineers and blockchain enthusiasts into the space in the University of Colorado Boulder. The club meets weekly to discuss the technology and provide challenges to start building within the space. We encourage all students regardless of major to join. All communication is done through the discord chat. We will also add a social token soon!

Features.title: Learn to navigate the crypto world
Features.text: Ethereum, Solana, Bitcoin, DAG's DAO's NFT's this world is complicated. We will help learn it all.

Features.title: Learn blockchain code
Features.text: We will teach you the array of different languages and skills you learn to get employed in the market or have a stratup.

Features.title: Participate in Hackathons
Features.text: We will organize teams to participate in hackathons to win sponsorships and build a name in the blockchain realm.

Features.title: Meet like-minded entreupreneurial and tech-minded folk
Features.text: Participate in a thriving community of future focused people.
